resources.string: There are six different color choices and there are four areas where you can put these colors. Initially, the game randomly sets an order and expects a guess from you. Once you have confirmed the order, the game will give you some hints about the order that is confirmed. If you find the order in eight steps or less, then you win, otherwise you lose. After you won the game, your score is calculated on the basis of the number of predictions and elapsed time.

- 2 indicators are provided to help you
 - Black dots indicates the number of correct colours placed in the correct position
 - White dots indicates the number of correct colours placed in the wrong position
 - There are eight opportunity to choose correct order
 - Each correct prediction(number of black dots) brings 5 points
 - Each color prediction(number of white dots) brings 1 points
